informationCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationCollect.intro: We collect information you provide directly to us when you:
items: Create an account
Update your profile
Create a work schedule
Create events with your friends
Contact our support team
Use Google to authenticate to our services

googleData.title: Google User Data We Collect
googleData.intro: When you use Google Sign-In or connect your Google Calendar, we collect the following data:
items: Google profile information (name, email, profile picture)
Google Calendar access tokens and events data (to create and manage your calendar events)
googleData.usage: This data is used solely for authentication and calendar integration purposes. We do not share this data with third parties. We neither make it available to any other user on the platform.

informationUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
informationUse.intro: We use the information we collect to:
items: Provide and maintain our services
Personalize your experience
Improve our services
Communicate with you
Ensure platform security

thirdPartyServices.title: 3. Third-Party Services
thirdPartyServices.intro: We use the following third-party services to provide and improve our platform:
services: Render (render.com) - For hosting our website and server infrastructure
Cloudflare - For domain services and enhanced security
Amazon SES (Simple Email Service) - For sending registration confirmation emails
GitHub - For hosting and version control of our application code
Google OAuth - For secure authentication and user sign-in
Google Calendar API - For calendar integration and event management
thirdPartyServices.privacyPoliciesIntro: These services may collect and process certain data according to their own privacy policies:

informationSharing.title: 4. Information Sharing
informationSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with:
items: Our third-party service providers mentioned above, solely for the purpose of providing our services
Google services for authentication and calendar integration
Service providers who assist in our operations
Law enforcement when required by law
Other users according to your privacy settings

dataProcessing.title: 5. Data Processing and Storage
dataProcessing.content: Your data is primarily processed and stored in secure cloud environments provided by Render. Email communications are processed through Amazon SES, and our domain services are managed by Cloudflare. Authentication is handled through Google OAuth, and calendar data is processed through Google Calendar API. All data transmission is encrypted using industry-standard protocols.

dataSecurity.title: 6. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information.

userRights.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate data
Request deletion of your data
Object to data processing
Export your data

contact.title: 8. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: support@offshoresync.com
